function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High patient density in queue","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High resource utilization","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data collection and analysis from 10 smartphones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High interarrival time leading to fewer patients vaccinated","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Exceeding layout boundaries","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overutilization of resources in anamnesis, inoculation, and registration","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High variability in time between arrivals","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unbalanced integration of different types of resources","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overcrowding and bottleneck due to excessive number of doctors","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Testing mobile application in a smaller clinic may result in potential exposure to contagious diseases for the operators and patients.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Expansion of the digital twin framework to a bigger case may involve the introduction of new smartphones and badges, leading to potential risks of contamination and disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implementing a digital twin for each specific clinic due to non-linear relationships between clinic size and configuration may result in increased resource and time investment for implementation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High probability of individuals having a body temperature lower than 37.5 \tc","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited space for mass vaccination clinic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate anamnesis and rejection probability","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Elderly people taking more time for forms fill-in and vaccine inoculation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Probability differences between adults and elderly people","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Time measurements and distributions for vaccination process parameters","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of physical system data in virtual system","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through physical system data handling","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation of physical system data","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Operators sharing data without proper sanitation or protection measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inaccurate translation of unix time stamp into date and time","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Replicating solutions in the physical system without proper testing","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of shared badges by multiple patients can lead to indirect contact and potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proximity-based data transfer through nfc technology can lead to the spread of contagious diseases if the smartphones and badges are not properly sanitized.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of visibility into the number of patients and their contact with the badges increases the difficulty of contact tracing and containment of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Automation failure in data collection leading to inaccurate time values","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate mapping of the real process due to incomplete or unreliable data","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Resource overutilization leading to employee burnout and dissatisfaction","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Patient arrival inside the system may introduce contagious individuals into the environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Queue and waiting areas may facilitate close contact between individuals, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inoculation and treatment phases may lead to potential exposure to contaminated materials or infected individuals.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate vaccination process flowchart","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insufficient representation of resources in the simulation model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for dynamic factors in the simulation model","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to the entry of infected individuals into the clinic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Possibility of undetected contagious individuals entering the vaccination process","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of disease during the waiting period post-inoculation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of simulation with industry 4.0 creating a digital twin.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Constant bidirectional flow of information between physical and virtual systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mobile application collecting time measures and sending them to decision-makers.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wearable sensors and medical equipment may act as fomites for the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Real-time communication of disease status may lead to privacy and security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of iot technologies may introduce vulnerabilities to the healthcare system.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of digital twin technology in healthcare for remote monitoring and treatment","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of digital twin technology in manufacturing for decision support","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of data integration between physical and virtual objects","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to update virtual representation based on changes in the physical system","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate security measures for digital twin data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
